revised_title: Observations and Experiences of Mendip Mines
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the environment, geology, and health effects of the Mendip mines in Somersetshire. It describes the mountainous terrain, vegetation, and local climate, as well as the effects of working in the mines on human health and livestock. The author also discusses the mineral composition of the area and the methods used for extracting lead ore.
